website_summaries.verdict: Straight forward design on a simple budget-friendly avocado slicer utensil.
pros: You get 2 for the price of 1
No sharp edges to cut your fingers
Easy and inexpensive gadget for your kitchen
cons: The sharp edge is not very sharp, making it sometimes difficult to cut through the skin easily

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Avocado Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of these used at a local restaurant and decided to get one. When I saw on Amazon that they were only $5.99, I couldn't believe it. I ordered it that day. When it arrived I discovered for $5.99 I actually got TWO of the slicers for the price of one. If you enjoy avocado's as much as we do, and hate the entire process and mess of cutting them with a regular knife, this is a must have. I think I'm going to order a few extra for Christmas presents this year!
customer_reviews.author: Rushman

customer_reviews.title: Good idea; poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these, but the reality was a little disappointing. I like that it was an all in one tool, but there were some issues: the "knife" part isn't very sharp, which has already resulted in an accident. And the "slicer" part has plastic fins, which are a bit too wide to make nice slices. Going back to my paring knife.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Serious

product_meta.title: 3 in 1 Avocado Slicer and Pitter - Multi-functional Avocado Peeler Cutter Skinner and Corer, Avocado Tool (Pack of 2, Green & Orange)

Do you worry about getting hurt while cutting an avocado ?

This plastic avocado slicer is safe for you and your kids to use. It has no sharp edges that can injure your hands or fingers.
